sentences.en: Chipmunk - cheeked Louis Armstrong was one of the most famous band leaders of the big - band era.
sentences.cn: 脸颊鼓鼓像花栗鼠的路易·阿姆斯壮就是大乐团时代最有名的团长之一.

sentences.en: Once I brought her a chipmunk with a wound on its stomach.
sentences.cn: 一次,我带了只腹部受伤的花栗鼠去找她.

sentences.en: Photo taken in fall 2007. Chipmunk co - worker's backyard. My favorite chipmunk picture.
sentences.cn: 2007年同事家后院的花栗鼠. 等很久终于照到花栗鼠的照片. 最喜爱的一张.

sentences.en: Photo taken in fall 2007. Chipmunk in co - worker's backyard. We fed him almond and peanuts.
sentences.cn: 2007年同事家后院的花栗鼠. 等很久终于照到花栗鼠的照片. 喂它吃杏仁和花生.

sentences.en: She has put into the small, unwise head of the chipmunk the untutored fear of poisons.
sentences.cn: 花栗鼠愚蠢的小脑袋里却有天生的对于毒药的恐惧.

sentences.en: The boy stood motionless, like a mouse or a chipmunk when it knows you're watching.
sentences.cn: 男孩一动不动站着，好像一只老鼠或花栗鼠知道有人在盯着它一样。

sentences.en: The idea of a 50 gram cute, tiny and fluffy chipmunk with its adorable curly tail drinking from a baby bottle is enough to warm even the coldest hearts.
sentences.cn: 一个50克重的可爱的，小巧的，毛茸茸的金花鼠，还有一个讨人喜欢的卷毛大尾巴，捧着一个婴儿奶瓶在喝水，这个想法恐怕足够的温暖一个最冰冷的心。

sentences.en: The picture featured a cartoon rendering of the fan’s face on top of the company’s logo of a cute chipmunk.
sentences.cn: 这些画像是印在公司非常可爱的花栗鼠标志上。

sentences.en: The weasel population also increased, following the growth of the chipmunk population.
sentences.cn: 黄鼠狼群也随着金花鼠数目的增加增长了。

sentences.en: THIS little chipmunk is hungry . Can you help him get to his acorns?
sentences.cn: 你能帮这只花栗鼠找到橡子 吗 ?
这只小花栗鼠肚子饿了。

sentences.en: When a squirrel or a rabbit or a chipmunk freezes, it can remain almost entirely motionless for minutes at a time.
sentences.cn: 当一只松鼠，兔子或花栗鼠冻结时，它可以一次保持完全静止不动达数分钟之久。

trans.tran_en: a small American animal similar to a  squirrel  with black lines on its fur
